org.apache.jackrabbit.core.search.lucene
Class MatchAllScorer

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lucene.search.Scorer
      org.apache.jackrabbit.core.search.lucene.MatchAllScorer
class MatchAllScorer
extends org.apache.lucene.search.Scorer

The MatchAllScorer implements a Scorer that scores / collects all documents in the index that match an optional field / atom-filter. In case there are no filters, this MatchAllScores simply collects all documents in the index that are not marked as deleted.

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $, $Date: 2004/06/15 13:52:13 $

Parameters:
reader - the IndexReader

Throws:
IOException - if an error occurs while collecting hits. e.g. while reading from the search index.

Scores documents until maxDoc has reached.

Parameters:
hc - the HitCollector from the underlying lucene query.
maxDoc - collect hits until maxDoc has reached.
